title: Between Iz*one Minju and Twice Tzuyu, who is prettier in your opinion? I know they are both pretty but I just want to see it from your standards. - Quora

response.answer_text: To be honest both are really pretty. In simple words they are goddesses. But if you want me to choose then I personally would choose Tzuyu not because she is popular than Minju or anything. Tzuyu has a very mature and elegant look. Whereas Minju is still young and has one of those innocent and young looks. But both are really pretty and mark my words, Minju is soon going to be one of top tier visuals in kpop and in fact she is. But Minju is still young. I LOVE BOTH OF THEM. ❤❤ TZUYU       MINJU       Both are indeed pretty!!

Ughhhh , this really hard but I like both of them Together in their own unique way like I like Tzuyu when she is in her resting face, here are some examples    She looks really good when she is in her resting face and that doesn’t mean i don’t like her when she is smiling she looks like an Angel when she is smiling but I prefer her resting face now for minju I love her when she smiles , there is something about her smiles that makes me fall for her even more 😭      Her smile is 😳 in the end both if them are pretty 💕

No offense Minju but I find Tzuyu prettier ._. Minju has:  Big EyesDouble EyelidsFull LipsV-Line JawPale SkinSmall FaceAegyo-salFlat Nose BridgeTzuyu has:  Small FaceBig Eyesdouble eyelidsfull lipsaegyo-salTan SkinNo V-line JawTzuyu wins. Minju’s nose bridge is flat, and that doesn’t really look good in some angles. I find Tzuyu’s nose more attractive.
